name: Up Your Level
description:
Up Your Level is a work-in-progress game I'm looking to release on steam once finished. Your goal is to level up and later on I will add very simplistic upgrades and other things to the game. The game is meant to be simple to play and more of a kinda relaxing or just something extra to do. Any ideas on things that should be added or changed are very welcome.

Apologies for the poor screenshots my PC makes all my screenshots dark.
